enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Helen Plume (New Zealand) reported on the informal consultations.
She said Parties had been unable to remove all of the brackets from the draft conclusions on emissions from fuel used for international aviation and maritime transportation.
Following discussions in Plenary, Parties agreed to remove the brackts.
SBSTA then adopted the conclusions, as amended (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.28).
